mapper.select: select program.* from sbnmembersubscriptionprogram subpgm join corlearningprogram program ON subpgm.LearningProgramId=program.ID where subpgm.MemberRoleId=#{memberRoleId}
select link.ID, link.ContentName,link.ContentPath from corlearningcontent lc join corlearningcontent link on lc.LinkedLearningContentId=link.ID where lc.ID=#{learningContentId}

select course.ID as courseId, course.Name, course.Description from sbnmembersubscriptionprogram sbnpgm JOIN sbnsubscriptioncourse subcourse ON sbnpgm.ID=subcourse.MemSubscriptionProgId JOIN corcurriculumcourse curcourse ON subcourse.CurriculumCourseId=curcourse.ID JOIN corcourse course ON curcourse.CourseId=course.ID where sbnpgm.MemberRoleId=#{memberRoleId} and sbnpgm.LearningProgramId=#{learningProgramId}

select course.ID as courseId, course.Name, course.Description from sbnmembersubscriptionprogram sbnpgm JOIN sbnsubscriptioncourse subcourse ON sbnpgm.ID=subcourse.MemSubscriptionProgId JOIN corcurriculumcourse curcourse ON subcourse.CurriculumCourseId=curcourse.ID JOIN corcourse course ON curcourse.CourseId=course.ID where sbnpgm.MemberRoleId=#{memberRoleId} and sbnpgm.LearningProgramId=#{learningProgramId} order by course.CreationDate DESC LIMIT 0, 3

select notes.* from sbnsubscribernotes notes join sbnmembersubscriptionprogram program on notes.MemSubscriptionProgId=program.ID join sbnsubscriptioncourse sbn on sbn.ID=notes.SubscriptionCourseId join corcurriculumcourse cor on cor.ID = sbn.CurriculumCourseId join corlearningcomponentcontent corlc on notes.LearningComponentContentId=corlc.ID where notes.LearningComponentId=#{learnCompId} and corlc.LearningComponentId=#{learnCompId} and corlc.LearningContentId=#{learnCmpContId} and cor.CourseId=#{subscrCourseId} and program.MemberRoleId=#{memberRoleId} and notes.NotesType=#{type}

select * from sbnsubscribernotes notes join sbnmembersubscriptionprogram program on notes.MemSubscriptionProgId=program.MemSubscriptionProgId where notes.SubscriptionCourseId=#{subscrCourseId} and notes.LearningComponentId=#{learnCompId} and notes.LearningComponentContentId=#{learnCmpContId} and program.MemberRoleId=#{memberRoleId} and notes.NotesType=#{noteType}
mapper.insert: insert into sbnsubscribernotes(CreationDate, NoteTitle, NoteDescription, NoteDuration, NotesType,NotesContent,SubscriptionCourseId,LearningComponentId,LearningComponentContentId,MemSubscriptionProgId) values(now(), #{noteTitle}, #{noteDescription}, #{noteDuration}, #{type},#{content}, (select subcourse.ID from sbnsubscriptioncourse subcourse,corcurriculumcourse curcourse where subcourse.CurriculumCourseId=curcourse.ID and curcourse.courseId=#{courseId}), #{learnCompId}, (select ID from corlearningcomponentcontent where LearningComponentId=#{learnCompId} and LearningContentId=#{learnCmpContId} ), (select ID from sbnmembersubscriptionprogram where memberroleid=#{memberRoleId}) )

insert into corcontentenrichment(LinkType, LinkDescription,uri,coordinates,duration,LinkElement,parentContent, enrichmentid) values(#{type},#{description} ,#{url} , #{coordinates},#{duration},#{title},#{parentId}, (select enrichmentid from corenrichment where LearningComponentId=#{learningCompId} and learningcontentid=#{learningContId} and courseid=#{courseId} and CreatorMemberRoleId=#{memberRoleId}) )
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.update: update corcontentenrichment set uri=#{url}, duration=#{duration}, coordinates=#{coordinates}, LinkDescription=#{description}, LinkElement=#{title}, parentContent=#{parentId} where ID=#{contentEnrId}
